thread.title: Novartis Buys Another 2.5% In Israel's Gamida Cell - Medical Daily
thread.title_full: Novartis Buys Another 2.5% In Israel's Gamida Cell - Medical Daily - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Medical Daily
title: Novartis Buys Another 2.5% In Israel's Gamida Cell - Medical Daily
text:
Swiss drugmaker Novartis will invest up to an extra $15 million in Gamida Cell, an Israeli developer of stem cell therapies, Gamida said on Sunday. Novartis last year invested $35 million in the company for a 15 percent stake, in a deal that could reach $600 million if Novartis exercises a buyout option that expires in 2016.
 Medical Daily.
